attributes.action: reverse the normal process of creating legislation ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
so that the end users (enforcers and targets of the legislation) draft the regulations and lawyers are only permitted to make the minimum amendments to ensure compliance with legal principles.

Currently in regulatory functions the end users are usually presented with a fait accomplis by the legal profession who then spend considerable effort in refusing changes requested by people with far more experience of both the field in question and the practicalities of enforcement.
